mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, gender, birth, tel, email, address, memberNo, gradeNo) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{address}, member_seq.nextval, '4')
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id = #{id}
select count(*) from member where email = #{email}
select id from member where id = #{id}
select email from member where email = #{email} and id = #{id}
select id from member where email = #{email} and name = #{name}
mapper.update: update member set pw = #{pw} where id = #{id}
update member set pw = #{pw}, birth = #{birth}, gender = #{gender}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address} where id=#{id}
